value.0:
Spell Level(s): Wizard / Sorcerer 9
Innate Level: 9
Caster Level: 17
School: Abjuration
Descriptor(s): 
Component(s): Verbal
Range: Medium
Area of Effect / Target: Colossal
Duration: Instant
Additional Counter Spells: 
Save: None
Spell Resistance: No

Mordenkainen's Disjunction attempts to strip all magical effects from a single target. It can also target a group of creatures, attempting to remove the most powerful spell effect from each creature. To remove an effect, the caster makes a dispel check of 1d20, +1 per caster level (to a maximum of +20) against a DC of 11 + the spell effect's caster level. Also, this spell strips a single enemy mage of up to 6 magical defenses or a group of mages of two spell protections each. This spell will also lower the SR of all creatures within the area of effect by 10.

Affected spells include: Spell Mantles, Globes of Invulnerability, Stoneskins, Premonition, Protection from Elements, Ghostly and Ethereal Visage, Mage Armor, Shadow Shield and Elemental Shield.
